Utterance: Were she here, she would vote.
Comments: Let’s imagine the sentence :  « If she was here, I would have gone to the beach », which is equivalent to « Were she here, I would have gone to the beach ». A representation for this sentence would be : (g / go.02 :arg0 (I / I) :arg4 (b / beach) :condition (s / she :arg1-of (b / be-located-at-91 :arg2 (h / here))). So, this is why « were she here » is represented that way on the left // « Were she here, she would vote »
